text: data is all around us whether it's log
files generated by customers using your
mobile and web applications new
e-commerce purchases in game player
activity or as a fire hose of
information coming from social networks
Financial trading floors and geospatial
services collecting storing and
analyzing this type of high throughput
information helps you stay up to dat on
your customers organization and business
but requires complex software and tons
of infrastructure that can be expensive
to buy provision and manage enter Amazon
Kinesis Kinesis makes it easy to set up
extremely high-capacity pipes which can
collect and analyze your data in real
time at any scale enabling you to
respond to anything from a new trade to
a new high score immediately so instead
of having data locked away in large text
based log files which you keep meaning
to look at later just send each event to
Kinesis and have it analyzed right away
find patterns trap exceptions and keep
an eye on all all your operational
details taking decisive action instantly
or maybe you're working with financial
services data you can now run minute by
minute analytics continuously instead of
waiting until the end of the business
day create Dynamic dashboards such as
value at risk stats or update your
financial models and simulations as soon
as new data arrives turn raw data into
detailed actionable information paying
for the resources you need as and when
you need them and easily integrate with
the rest of the am Amazon web services
Big Data family including S3 red shift
and Dynamo DB to get started just create
a new stream endpoint from the AWS
console or sdks and start pushing data
in you can choose the level of provision
performance your data stream requires
and add or remove capacity if your
throughput changes you can start running
real-time analytics by incorporating the
provided client Library into your
application and then autoscale the
computation using Amazon ec2 there are
no upfront fees and you'll only only pay
for what you use so to start using data
in real time at any scale visit our
website and sign up today
